score.title: I'm from Miami fuckin' Beach and you wanna show me the ocean, huh? And what about sun, does it ever shine around here?!Ray Bones, Get Shorty
paragraphs: Florida is fucking...weird, man.  I don't know if there's a state sized hole in the ozone layer that casts direct heat from the sun onto the inhabitants of the state and fries their brains or if it's something in the water, but you can't go a day without someone having their life completely implode and then instantly go crazy.  There's a reason FARK.com has a section just for Florida. Enjoy.  ~RM
